text: lutvinre janannal addehattinre atuttekk otivannu. mumpu tanne avar durnatappukarayirunnu. addeham parannu: enre janannale, ita enre penmakkal. avaran ninnalkk kututal parisud'dhiyullavar. (avare ninnalkk vivaham kalikkamallea?) atinal ninnal allahuve suksikkukayum enre atithikalute karyattil enne apamanikkatirikkukayum ceyyuka. ninnalute kuttattil vivekamulla oru purusanumille
